hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Reversal Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When spot Bitcoin ETFs experience 3+ consecutive days of net outflows totaling >$800M, a reversal to net inflows on day 4 will trigger a 48-hour momentum move exceeding the cumulative outflow period's price decline by 1.5x.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained ETF outflows create oversold conditions. The first inflow day signals institutional re-entry, often preceding retail FOMO. The 1.5x recovery target accounts for short covering and momentum chasing.
entry_conditions: 3+ consecutive days of net ETF outflows >$800M cumulative
Day 4 shows net inflows >$150M by 2PM ET
BTC price remains below VWAP of outflow period

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches level representing 1.5x recovery of outflow period decline
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Break below lowest low of outflow period

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Day-4 inflows fail to produce >1.2x recovery of outflow decline in 70% of historical instances.
